Legal Status

U.S. FEDERAL LAW #


                    Context: 
                    This chunk appears in the Erowid.org webpage under the "Pharmaceuticals" section, following informational menus related to Erowid's book resources and support options, and directly transitions to a detailed legal status overview for cyclobenzaprine (Flexeril) in the United States and internationally.

                    Text: 
                    Donate now and receive yours!

Cyclobenzaprine (Flexeril)

Legal Status

by Erowid

U.S. FEDERAL LAW #

Caution : All legal information should be verified through other sources. [see below]

U.S. FEDERAL LEGAL SUMMARY Cyclobenzaprine REGULATED Yes STATUS Prescription Only SCHEDULE Un-Scheduled

Cyclobenzaprine (Flexeril) is unscheduled in the United States, but is available by prescription only. This means that sales and distribution are allowed only by those with a license and only to those with a prescription (according to FDA regulations). Possession is not illegal even without a prescription.

INTERNATIONAL LAW #

Costa Rica #

Available without prescription in Costa Rica. (unconfirmed) (thanks JB)

If you have information about the legal status of this substance in any other country, please let us know.

CAUTION & DISCLAIMER #


                    Context: 
                    This section provides detailed legal information about cyclobenzaprine (Flexeril), focusing on its prescription-only status in the United States (unscheduled but regulated by the FDA) and mentioning its possible over-the-counter availability in Costa Rica. It is part of a broader Erowid page that covers legal statuses, safety, and resources related to various pharmaceuticals.

CAUTION & DISCLAIMER #

Erowid legal information is a summary of data gathered from site visitors, government documents, websites, and other resources. We are not lawyers and can not guarantee the accuracy of the information provided here. We do our best to keep this information correct and up-to-date, but laws are complex and constantly changing. Laws may also vary from one jurisdiction to another (county, state, country, etc)...this list is not comprehensive.

RELATED RESOURCES #

                    Context:

It notes the limitations and sources of their legal data, issues a disclaimer about the accuracy and scope of the information, and provides metadata (creation/modification date, copyright) and navigation links back to related sections.
